abstract: The physicist Stephen Hawking is trying out a device the size of a matchbox that aims to allow him to communicate by merely thinking, David Ewing Duncan reports in Tuesday's New York Times. The iBrain is part of a new generation of devices and algorithms intended to monitor and diagnose conditions like sleep apnea, depression and autism.

headline.main: Daily Report: A Device to Read Your Thoughts
